Space

The base class for spaces.

Summary
SpaceThe base class for spaces.
Functions
setup (abstract)To be implemented by subclasses.
interfaceIsBuiltReturns whether the interface of the space has been built yet.
setInterfaceIsBuilt (private)Set the private interface built flag.
onCssLoad (private)Callback handler when the space’s css file has loaded.
addDeferredNew (private)Adds a deferred shift was just created.
addDeferredShift (private)Adds a deferred shift to be show.
addDeferredEdit (private)Adds a deferred shift to be edited.
setCssLoaded (private)A setter for the internal flag tracking whether the css for this space has loaded yet.
cssIsLoaded (private)
show (private)Show the space.
hideHide the space’s interface is there is one.
setIsVisibleSetter for internal flag about whether the Space and/or it’s shifts are visible.
isVisibleReturns value of internal flag about wheter the Space’s interface or any of its shifts are visible.

hideInterfaceHide the interface of the space.

blurShiftBlur a shift.

onShiftDelete (abstract)Called after a shift has been deleted.
onShiftDestroy (abstract)Called after a shift has been destroyed.
onShiftShow (abstract)Called after shift has been shown.
onShiftHide (abstract)Called after a shift has been hidden.
onShiftFocus (abstract)Called after a shift has been focused.
onShiftBlur (abstract)Called after a shift has been blurred.
setValueSafe wrapper around GM_setValue for spaces.
getValueSafe wrapper around GM_getValue
updateTitleOfShift (private)Update the title of a shift, if appropriate.
mainViewForShift (private)Returns the main view DOM node of the shift.
saveState (private)Saves the state of the space.
restoreState (private)Restores the state of the space.

Functions

setup (abstract)

setup: function()

To be implemented by subclasses.

interfaceIsBuilt

interfaceIsBuilt : function()

Returns whether the interface of the space has been built yet.

setInterfaceIsBuilt (private)

setInterfaceIsBuilt : function(val)

Set the private interface built flag.

Parameters

vala boolean.

onCssLoad (private)

onCssLoad : function()

Callback handler when the space’s css file has loaded.  The interface is not built until after this function has been called.  Also any shifts that were set to creaetd/shown/edited.

addDeferredNew (private)

addDeferredNew: function(shift)

Adds a deferred shift was just created.  This happens when a user create a shift using the Menu for a space that hasn’t loaded yet.

Parameters

shiftshift content Javascript object.

addDeferredShift (private)

addDeferredShift: function(shiftId)

Adds a deferred shift to be show.  This happens a user attempt to view a shift from Console for a space that hasn’t loaded yet.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

addDeferredEdit (private)

addDeferredEdit: function(shiftId)

Adds a deferred shift to be edited.  This happens when a user attempts to edit an existing shift from the Console.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

setCssLoaded (private)

setCssLoaded: function(val)

A setter for the internal flag tracking whether the css for this space has loaded yet.

cssIsLoaded (private)

cssIsLoaded: function()

show (private)

show : function()

Show the space.  Simple calls Space.showInterface

See Also

Space.showInterface

hide

hide : function()

Hide the space’s interface is there is one.

See Also

Space.hideInterface

setIsVisible

setIsVisible: function(val)

Setter for internal flag about whether the Space and/or it’s shifts are visible.

Parameters

vala boolean.

isVisible

isVisible: function()

Returns value of internal flag about wheter the Space’s interface or any of its shifts are visible.

Returns

A boolean.

showInterface

showInterface : function(position)

Show the space interface.  This can be overriden if necessary but you must remember to call this.parent() from your overriding method.

Parameters

position (optional)the x/y position of the mouse.

hideInterface

hideInterface : function()

Hide the interface of the space.  If there are any unsaved shifts they will be destroyed.  Can be overriden, remember to call this.parent() from your overriding method.

buildInterface (abstract)

buildInterface : function()

subclass should implement this if they want to present a custom interface.

getName

getName : function()

Returns the name of the shift.

Returns

The name of the space as a string.

addShift (private)

addShift : function(aShift)

Adds a shift to an internal array.  Implicity creates a new instance of a shift based on the contents of the passed in Object.

Parameters

Takes a shift JSON object and creates and attaches event handlers.

Returns

The internal shift instance.

allocateNewShift

allocateNewShift: function()

Used when it necessary to kick off shift allocation from with in a Space and not from the ShiftMenu.  ImageSwap uses this.

editShift

editShift : function(shiftId)

Tell the shift to go into edit mode.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

updateShift

updateShift : function(aShift)

Update a shift.  Implicity calls the SSUpdateShift in Core to update the ShiftSpace DB.

Parameters

aShiftThe shift instance to update.

hideShift

hideShift : function(shiftId)

Hides a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

orderFront

orderFront : function(shiftId,
layer)

Move a shift back in the display order.  This is generally called by ShiftSpace.

Parameters

shiftIdthe id of the Shift.
layernot yet implemented.

orderBack

orderBack : function(shiftId,
layer)

Move a shift front in the display order.

Parameters

shiftIdthe id of the Shift.
layernot yet implemented.

setDepth

setDepth: function(shiftId,
depth)

Not yet implemented.

regionIsObscured

regionIsObscured : function(region)

Not yet implemented.

setCurrentShift (private)

setCurrentShift : function(newShift)

Set the current shift object.

Parameters

newShiftan internal shift instance.

setCurrentShiftById

setCurrentShiftById: function(shiftId)

Same as Space.setCurrentShift but can use an id instead.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

getCurrentShift

getCurrentShift : function()

Get the current shift.

Returns

The current focused shift instance.

focusShift

focusShift : function(shiftId)

Focus a shift.  Implicitly calls Space.setCurrentShift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

blurShift

blurShift: function(shiftId)

Blur a shift.  If the shift is being edited it will be taken out of editing mode.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftPrepare (abstract)

onShiftPrepare : function(shiftId)

Called before a shift will be shown.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftCreate (abstract)

onShiftCreate : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been created.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftEdit (abstract)

onShiftEdit: function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been edited.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftSave (abstract)

onShiftSave : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been saved.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftDelete (abstract)

onShiftDelete : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been deleted.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftDestroy (abstract)

onShiftDestroy : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been destroyed.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftShow (abstract)

onShiftShow : function(shiftId)

Called after shift has been shown.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftHide (abstract)

onShiftHide : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been hidden.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftFocus (abstract)

onShiftFocus : function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been focused.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

onShiftBlur (abstract)

onShiftBlur: function(shiftId)

Called after a shift has been blurred.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

setValue

setValue : function(key,
value)

Safe wrapper around GM_setValue for spaces.

Parameters

keya string.  The actual key is “spaceName.key”
valuea value to be set.

getValue

getValue : function(key,
defaultValue,
callback)

Safe wrapper around GM_getValue

Parameters

keyreturns a key.  The real key is “spaceName.key”.
defaultValuea default value is the key doesn’t exist.
callbacka callback function.

updateTitleOfShift (private)

updateTitleOfShift: function(shiftId,
title)

Update the title of a shift, if appropriate.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.
titlea new title <string>.

mainViewForShift (private)

mainViewForShift: function(shiftId)

Returns the main view DOM node of the shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

A DOM node.

saveState (private)

saveState: function()

Saves the state of the space.  For the moment just saves the currently visible shifts.  Normally used when a plugin takes over the entire current browser viewport.

restoreState (private)

restoreState: function()

Restores the state of the space.  Normally used when a plugin has relinquished the browser’s current viewport.

isNewShift

isNewShift: function(shiftId)

Used to check whether a shift is unsaved.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

xmlhttpRequest

xmlhttpRequest: function(config)

A safe wrapper around GM_xmlhttpRequest.

Parameters

configobject with properties as defined by GM_xmlhttpRequest.

setPref

setPref: function(key,
value)

Set a space pref.

Parameters

keya key.
valuea value to be set.  If value is an Object make sure there aren’t circular references.

getPref

getPref: function(key,
defaultValue,
callback)

Returns a space pref.

Parameters

keya key.
defaultValuea default value.
callbacka function to be called when the value has been retrieved.
